A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 100% Masterpiece. Can´t tell too much without saying spoilers\, so I will be specific\, this is one of the best Star Wars movies ever made\, mind blowing and twisted. Rian Johnson did a sequel with a lot of risky plots that at the end result positive\, and took the main characters to a lot different paths that we didn´t expected it. A+
